Very yummy crepes, quality ingredients and expertly prepared, plus with gluten free options a-plenty.  Super yummy cocktails, too.  I had one made of red pepper and vanilla vodka, plus who knows what else.  Sounded weird... but was very refreshing and delicate.  Decor is delightful, service is speedy, and prices reasonable (for Barcelona).  Only downside was that it was a little bit warm and stuffy inside.  Other than that, I would return for sure!
